name: Bulls & Cows Game
description:
Included is the zip file v. 1.2

This was a small educational game made while learning UE4 C++ engine API.

Game build in C++ using Unreal Engine 4.22

V 1.2 - 

Added commands to exit for console "exit" and  "mainmenu" go to main menu, as well as "hint" to provide a helpful hint to the player.

Added menu feature for selection.

Added difficulty levels.

Added extra list of words.

Added feature to load words in runtime.

Optimized loading words.

Total new possible random words selection (2,499 isogram words).

Fixed UI bug.

Fixed sound bug.
